history.title: Car History
history.description1: We are the second owners of this vehicle, carefully maintained by its first family owners. It has always received proper services and has been used both in the city and for trips.
history.description2: We continued to take care of it and have mainly used it in Buenos Aires and trips to the coast.

whySell.title: Reason for Sale
whySell.description: We are selling this car because of a family opportunity that allowed us to get a newer model. It's time for someone else to enjoy it.

whyBuy.title: Why Buy It?
whyBuy.description: This is our first car, so we explored multiple options to take care of our investment. Three different mechanics have approved it: great value for money and ready for many more miles.

doubts.title: Why Choose a Japanese Car?
doubts.description: While there are Mercosur models with fewer years or kilometers in its range, the quality and equipment of this vehicle is unparalleled. It has no noise, the materials are in perfect condition, and it has only required routine maintenance. It's ready to enjoy.

ideal.title: Who Is It Ideal For?
ideal.city: For moving around the city: Low fuel consumption and easy to park.
ideal.kids: For taking the kids: Surprising interior space.
ideal.firstCar: For your first car: Simple, reliable, and hassle-free.
ideal.travel: For traveling: Stability on the road with a sporty touch.
